mapper.select: SELECT EMPLOYEE.EMP_ID, STORE.STORE_ID, EMPLOYEE.EMP_NAME, EMPLOYEE.ADDRESS, EMPLOYEE.PHONENUM, EMPLOYEE.EMAIL, EMPLOYEE.WORKTIME, EMPLOYEE.BANKACCOUNT, EMPLOYEE.SALARY FROM EMPLOYEE, STORE WHERE STORE.STORE_ID = #{store_id} AND EMPLOYEE.EMP_ID = #{emp_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE (EMP_ID, STORE_ID, EMP_NAME, ADDRESS, PHONENUM, EMAIL, WORKTIME, BANKACCOUNT, SALARY) VALUES (#{emp_id}, #{store_id}, #{emp_name}, #{address}, #{phone_num}, #{email}, #{work_time}, #{bank_account}, #{salary})
